sense.def:
To snatch something
pomeni nekaj hitro vzeti ali potegniti stran.

seg.quote: He snatched the letter from the man's hand.
He remembered snatching at his gun.

sense.def:
To snatch a small amount of time or an opportunity
pomeni hitro izkoristiti kratko obdobje ali priložnost.

seg.quote: I packed, then snatched four hours' sleep.
I snatched the opportunity to tell them that I was leaving.

sense.def:
A snatch of a conversation or a song
je zelo majhen del pogovora ali pesmi.
